title: Is this a real "LGBDTTIQQAAP" course?
subtitle: A Canadian school press release has been used in a long-term face-to-face manner to draw the attention of teachers who feel that the advanced language used to describe LGBT people has been overtaken by them.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A published picture from the Ontario Primary Teachers ' Union for a comprehensive training course "LGBDTTIQAAP" appears.
